body:
Comment 6 by **alec@swapoff.org**: 
First, please try and use a more positive tone when replying to bug reporters. It costs
nothing to be polite.

Second:

[alec@ckt-imac:~]ls -l /usr/bin/gcc
lrwxr-xr-x  1 root  wheel  12 Aug 21 21:04 /usr/bin/gcc@ -> llvm-gcc-4.2
[alec@ckt-imac:~]ls -l /usr/bin/llvm-gcc-4.2
lrwxr-xr-x  1 root  wheel  32 Aug 21 21:04 /usr/bin/llvm-gcc-4.2@ ->
../llvm-gcc-4.2/bin/llvm-gcc-4.2
[alec@ckt-imac:~]ls -l /usr/llvm-gcc-4.2/bin/llvm-gcc-4.2
-rwxr-xr-x  1 root  wheel  117168 Aug 21 21:04 /usr/llvm-gcc-4.2/bin/llvm-gcc-4.2*

A quick Google shows this is not unique to Go (http://bit.ly/SqUumj) and HAXE/NME in
particular had the exact same issue:
http://www.haxenme.org/community/forums/installing-nme/mountain-lion/
